title: Fall in Love
description: The fall season brings roaring fires, hot chocolate, and the perfect weather to fall in love.Fall in Love is a collection of steamy and dreamy stories from 9 make-you-swoon romance authors. Each story is brand new bringing you happily ever afters with a cozy cup of the fall season.Stories include:Lucky GuessAmanda RichardsonRemembering youBrittany TarkingtonShadyCallie RaeA New BeginningE.K. WoodcockHey, PumpkinJami DenisePumpkin SpiceLily AlexanderForbiddenS.L. SterlingTaking the FallT.K. CherryThe Consequences of LeavingVictoria Ellis
author: Callie Rae
